title: Mortification - 1998 Miracle Tour.mp4
description: Yep, THIS IS THE MIRACLE TOUR FOR SURE! This concert in Dallas Texas was performed just 5 months after I was given 2 hours to live the 2nd time. In April 1998 I woke up an L1 paraplegic & could not feel anything below the knees. I was told I would possibly never walk again. We had Recorded Triumph Of Mercy in the January & I must have sent a Nuclear Blast CD to Metal Blade Records USA in March? I cannot remember! Anyway, when I was wheelchair bound, couldn't walk & weighed just 90 pounds I got a phone call from Bill Metoyer at Metal Blade Records that I took at the Nurses Station in the Caulfield Rehabilitation Hospital where I lived for 3 months May, June & July 1998 & pushed my body till it walked again, even with my spine disconnected in the Lumbar 1. Metal Blade wanted to sign Triumph Of Mercy & Mortification for 3 Albums & Bill asked when we could next Tour The USA. I said "August". Then I had 3 months to get walking! But as you can see, even though I was back up to 54 kilograms or about 125 pounds I was still very skinny & uneasy on my feet. My Life's Story/ Biography is well on the way & should be out early 2015. My Australian Manager Vic Campbell is penning the story & is an incredible writer! MIRACLES STILL HAPPEN BECAUSE MY GOD IS THE GOD OF MIRACLES!! Steve.
